page.title: 18YOUTH CLUBS
page.content: Every Wednesday all the boys and girls from West Stoke and the Ashlings meet at the{Youth Club}from seven to nine o'clock.It is held at the West Stoke village hall.Special outings have been organised to Worthing for bowling and a rock climbing expedition.The youth club is great fun with activities such as{snooker,table {tennis and darts.} { St Mary's Church}at Funtington have a St. Richards Guild for the youth attending the Church.Sports evenings,outings and socials are a regular part of the groups activities. The{Bourne Comprehensive School}at Southbourne has a Community Centre with a{youth wing attached}which attracts teenagers from the study area.
